examples.comment_2: Pass {{FileFormatUp}} document path to Watermarker constructor
examples.comment_3: Clear the document by deleting a watermark

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** simplifies the process of clearing watermarks from your business documents within {{EnvName}} applications. Integrate our library and follow these steps:
content.step_1: Begin by initializing the **Watermarker** class with your {{FileformatCap}} document. The API accepts the document either as a stream or a local file path for processing.
content.step_2: Leverage the **SearchCriteria** object to refine the set of watermarks for clearing. You can utilize an image as a search parameter alongside text or formatting attributes. The more specific your search criteria, the more precise the results will be.
content.step_3: Following the search, you'll receive a list of identified watermarks. Proceed by clearing these watermarks from the document.
content.step_4: Once the watermarks are cleared, save the final document using a local file path or a stream object.

more_features.title: Optimize Document Clarity with Java API for Watermark Removal | GroupDocs.Watermark
more_features.description: Enhance document clarity by seamlessly integrating watermark removal capabilities into your Java applications. Our Java API supports removing watermarks from various document types such as PDFs, Office files, and images, ensuring pristine document presentation.

feature_1.title: Java-Based Watermark Removal
feature_1.content: Empower your Java applications with the ability to remove watermarks accurately. Whether it's official documentation or sensitive content, maintain the integrity and clarity of your documents effortlessly.

feature_2.title: Efficient Bulk Deletion in Java
feature_2.content: Streamline the process of watermark removal across multiple documents with our Java API. This feature is especially useful for enterprises dealing with large volumes of files, enhancing productivity and document security.

feature_3.title: Advanced Watermark Editing and Removal
feature_3.content: Our Java API not only removes watermarks but also offers advanced editing options to fine-tune or completely erase watermark elements. Tailor your documents to meet exact business specifications with precision and flexibility.
